title: Dom Amore Sunday Read : When there were Giants in CT ; Xavier becomes  Quarterback High , For Dan Hurley , promised kept , and more
body_text:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
Fifty years ago, the Giants made New Haven their home. They were futile, forgettable, but a whole lot of fun to have around. … Two NFL starting quarterbacks from one CT high school? Believe it. … Remember Dan Hurley's promise, "it;'s coming?" Promise kept. More in the Sunday Read.
